text:
Hello abha,
You are a good person. Ab chaapu to kya hi kahu wo to sbka pta hi hai.
Jyade baate to nhi ki apan ne, but yeah jo bhi kiya acha tha.
Always stay the same: helpful, mast, chaapu and thoughtful
Take care!
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Yo broo!
Same hall, same department and a same group of friends are not complete to define our wonderful journey in the campus. Infact, any number of words cannot describe our friendship throughout the 4 years completely.
It has been my pleasure to know a person who is peaceful yet lively, polite yet bakchod and introvert yet understanding.
I'll always carry the memories we made all these years and will try to make new ones till the time we live.
Me always coming to your room for casual chit chats, going to oat, talking about our favorite friend kuldeep xD, enjoying all the treats and what not. All of this is as fresh in my mind as covid is in minds of millions worldwide:p
Jokes apart, I seriously wish u are safe.
Miss u broo. Let's hope this shit gets over and we meet soon
Take care!
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Yo anchal!
Bhut achi bandi hai tu. Came to know you in 2nd year. 
Treat pr gaye, tu wing me bhi mil jaati thi, fir techkriti. N uske bhi baad library ke baahar techkriti ka haal chaal lol xD
Dekha jaye to itna bhi ni mile apan, but considerably yes, and it was worth it!

I wish tu hamesha esehi mast reh, khush reh and chaapti reh!
Last time mil nhi paaye but koi nahi jindagi to bhut bada safar hai, kya pta aage mile.

Till then khayal rakh!
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Namashkar Anirban da!
Friendly, Helping, Honest, Insightful, Admirable!
Bahut mast aadmi ho tum. Sabse khaas baat ye ki tum apne aap ko right prove krne me nahi, hamesha seekhne me interested rehte ho.. 
Tumse kuch samajhne me sach me bhut maja aata bhai.
Sahi hi kaha tumne asli baate to canteene me chai pr hi hoti. 
Mujhe bhut khushi hui jis tarike se tumne mujhe ek hall 12 resident ki trah apnaya. 
251 se 381 se lekr TP ka safar bhale hi khatam hua and bhut kuch seekhe hamlog but dosti jo ek baar kiya nibhate jarur ham ;)
So, no doubt aage bhi touch me rhenge hamesha!
Khayal rakho and milenge bhai tum harshit sb eksaath jab bhi ho and chai pr charcha jrur krenge :p
Till then stay safe and be the MAST anirban da!
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Yo tikna!
Quiet, observant, thoughtful, fun-loving, gadgetguru, lalaji n na jaane kitne hi upaadhiya kam hai tere liye.
One of the mast insaan i have met. Situation kaisa bhi ho solution nikaal hi lete.
Tumhare saath reh kr sbhi chill hojaate.
Aasha hai ki apni dosti bani rahe hmesha.
Kuch idea sochenge n milkr kuch bada jrur karenge. Apne useful insights dete rehna tum.
Milte hai n aage bhi economical trips pr chalte hai :p

Till then stay safe and be the same!
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Yo dost! 
Well if I go on writing then my hands would surely be in trouble typing on xD
But let me cut through the centre and put some of the most memorable stuffs here.
The voyage begins(Y-1): Well we are just cousin brothers in IITK fam lineage. Sailing through tough times, from sharing headphones to coming back Delhi in Shatabdi the stage was getting setup for the most defining times to come!
Y-2: Well we become SGs! Then comes the reporting day and we cycle through the lanes to reach Hall 13 in a cold morning. Not forgetting the fact that you cycled standing up( bcz of recovering from a back operation) we accompanied each other proving to be the best of the brothers. The whole year was full of ups and downs & surely highs and lows :p but nevertheless the memories which were being formed were the ones to stay forever.
Y-3: Changing circles, changing hobbies were underway. You became Core Team CS, i couldn't. I went to Techkriti, however, half-heartedly. Days passed and each of us explored our interests. We met but less often but the camaraderie was intact. We went high but not so often. Gradually, as a part of human nature, the circles played their roles and a point came when the circumstances created a misunderstanding which couldn't be removed soon. Facing consecutive lows, I was pushed to another place alone and away from the best of my peeps. Naturally, nothing was same. Not even the world which was hit by COVID lol
Y-4: We have moved ahead with the same virus around us and now even more virulent. But, maybe it helped us to connect once again and did something which may not have been that easy!

Lol, if I see we enjoyed a major part of college together and I hope we are in touch in future!
Stay safe
See you bro :)
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Aree chaapu ladki! Ab tere baare me kya hi bataya jaye kitna bhi likhu khatam hi na ho :p
A good natured, intelligent and well practically sabkuch me hi ek bakchod bandi!
I know u have a lot of friends but mere liye to u'll always be a special one. 
Naturally, apni utni memories nahi hai but jitni bhi hai yaadgaar hai and mai wo kabhi nahi bhulunga for sure. 
I always wish apan aage mile(hopefully more so in Gurgaon).
But anyways I'll always be there for you to the best of my capability. 
I wish tu hamesha khush rahe and ya apan hamesha touch me rahe
Take care arzu!
See you :)
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Are maisam bhai!
Bole to ekdumm masttt. Bhai 2 top se alag jarur hue but hai to aakhir 2 top ke hi log, once and always ;)
Baaki bakchodi to bahut kari hai apan ne. First year me cricket, priye seniors ki khatirdaari xD, or eco dept se related logo ke interesting events me tu hamesha paaya gaya h ;)
College time to yuhi dekhte nikal bhai lag rha but dosti to bana gaye
Ladakh ke liye guide to hai hi baaki apne liye :p

Milte hai bro! Stay same and haan bakchodi chaalu raheðŸ˜Ž
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Hello priyal,
Not much to tell about u but whatever there is, that's great.
I must say u are really different from what u may seem to a stranger and to the ones who know u well.
Haha n that's obviously on a positive note. 
U are simply beautiful, elegant, helping and a nice girl to know :)
Idk if we'd meet or not but I surely wish u a happy life ahead!
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Yo bro!!
Photographer, mth boi and above all a mast aadmi.
2 top wale hain, bakchod to honge hi xD 
Simply sweet and honest man.

I wish u a great future ahead. Stay in touch bhai. 
And unlike 3rd year, chill maarke roll and rock krsakte ab ;)

Chal bhai stay safe, stay bindaas!
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Namste bhai!
Dosti to aapse kaisi hui thi ye to yaad rkhna ni pdta :p
Baaki insaan bhut samajhdaar, chaapu and mast hai aap
Asha karte hai aage ka safar mast ho n aap hamesha khush rahe
Gale bhi nhi milskte, virtual hug hi sahi ðŸ¤—
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Eeeee hellllooo!
Sabse jindadil or bakchod ladki campus me!
Kaand krna(ya bs hojana xD) to tera part of life hai. But apne ko usse koi fark nahi pdta. Haa kaand i know ajeeb hote, hasi bhi aati sunkr(:p) but then settlement ke baad khush chitra bhi utni hi achi lagti.
Kaafi problems face ki h tune at times. I remember jab mai Medanta me mila tha, tu partially behosh thi and dekhkr acha ni lagrha tha bilkul :( But u came out even stronger!! :)
Tune jarurat pr hamesha shi advices diye(I followed ultimately haan xD) and masti me hamesha shaamil kiya.
Haa maana ki tu thodi bhulakkad hai xD but koi ni saari memories hamesha mere dimaag me fresh rahengi
Being your friend in campus was really worth it and I hope time ke saath apni dosti or bhi majboot ho :)
Kehne ko to ese bhut kuch hai but shyd jagah kam ;)
Bs pehle to sab safe rahe and apan jald hi milkr thodi bakchodi kare!
Adios. Khyal rakh :)
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Hello Deeksha!
Agar mujhe shi yaad hai to, first time apan GH canteene me mile the departmental fresher ke liye
Tum jaha bhi hoti ho environment chill krdeti ho. Utni open nhi ho sabse, but jo bhi tumhe jaante unke liye ye sb perception exist ni krta hoga i'm sure :p
I'm glad ki I met such a composed, lively, smart and a beautiful person.
Jyade interact to nahi kare apan, but jitne bhi kare it was worth it.
Baaki help to i'll always do to my best!

Wish u a great future ahead! 
And yeah, I'll ensure that we stay connected in future as well.
Stay safe and stay same :)
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
CHE ke maharathi ko mera pranam! First year ke Esc lab se hi apna jalwa dikhate aarhe ho.
But interesting to ye hai ki kabhi bhi bakchodi ka mauka miss nahi kiye.
Bahut saari bakchodi ki hai throughout the stay hamne. 
Kaistha sir to legend the hi but 453 me Imposter game n mookit hacking sach me kaafi khatarnaak tha ;)
Baaki apan itne bakchod hai hi ki apna graduation year to IITK kya puri duniya yaad rakhegi xD
But let's hope jrur mile aage kabhi usi enthu and jindadil ke saath!
Stay safe, stay chaapu!
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Priye hemant,

Start hoti hai and hamlog same family lineage ke species paate apne aap ko.
Naya culture, naya baap, naye bhai, achanak se bahut additions. Baap form bhadwane aate, tu sabse pehle likh kr baith jaata. Time bitta gaya, apani dosti badhti gayi.
Hall events se fraud maarkr CC jaana, pandey ko darana, deep ki wjah se unlocked room me chill maarte pakada jaana, phy103, phy102,summer of code, mini militia, thodi bhut pubg, drinking and blowing experiments(xD), bandi ke baare me cryptic baate, trip, crypto and hopefully aage ki saath me bakchodi.
College life ka kaafi time apan saath me bitaye hai and finally ek acha group ban gaya apna.
Tu,mai,tikna and more.. bhai hamesha connected rhenge, milte rhenge and dosti kam nahi hone denge <3

Chalo bhai, milte hai jald n trip maarte firse. Pahado ka shaukh to hai hi, saadhu log jo thehre ;)

tumhara bhai,
utsav
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Hi Jaya,
Thoda chill bhi maar liya kar :)
Haha class to sbke hone se hi puri lagti asal me. But I'm really glad that u feel I could make the maahaul more lighter.
I know last me thoda thik nahi raha but whi hai misunderstandings to hoti rehti.
Ab tujhe to pata hi hai as such mai chill rehta, so ye sb koi baat nahi. 
Truthrevealer ka to ab bhi pata ni xD but ye jrur pata hai ki shyd wo ek landmark event tha hamare batch ka.

All said and done, I wish you a great future ahead.
Stay safe and chaapte raho :)
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Yo ramya,
Even i don't exactly remember kaise jaana tumhe, maybe through manisha gang xD
But, kehte hai na agar safar achi ho to shuruat kya maayne rakhta ho
Really, it was nice meeting a chaapu drams club girl with such a loud voice and mast aura.
Jitna bhi interaction hua apna, its worth remembering.

Baaki na to chaapu ka pta na cool ka, but ab tum keh rhi to maanleta :p

I wish tumhe future me har khushi mile!
Stay safe and be the same! Take care
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Jitna unexpectedly COVID pehli baar aaya tha, usse jyade unexpectedly tera memoir aaya(though ache sense me) :p
Yo kiran!
Dil ki achi, mijaj ki mast, nature wise introvert, ladki to bindaas h tu
Teri khushi me mai hamesha khush hua n aage bhi hota rhunga.
Mere yearbook profile me 1st photo teri hi thi but is dar se ki tujhe kaise lagega mai nahi daal paya.
~2 saal se baat nahi ho payi apni. Bhut baar socha ki baat karu but kabhi himmat hi ni karpaya.
Dekh jab tak tu hurt nahi, mai to chill hu, so agar mere se koi galti hui to maaf krde.
Campus aakr to mai bhi milna chahta but kuch situations the jo ni aapaya.
But, Wo kehte na ki Kabhi kabhar shyd duriyan logo ko aur paas le aati. I hope apan bhi firse baate kare, mile, and mast party kare :p

Miss u a lot kiru <3
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Yoo bhai!
Got to know you as Abhishek's roomie and uske baad there is no turning back.
Bhai raat bhar baith kr che251 ke assignment me bakchodi, canteene jaakr chai samosa or tujhe intern ke liye chintit dekhna sb saath jiye hai apanlog.
Last 'normal' day bhi alag hi tha apan logo ka. baarish me bhingte b'day cake lekr gaye. 
Kya hi pata tha ki wo last din tha campus me milne ka :/
But anyways baat to yeh hai unsab ke bich apni dosti gehri hogyi jo bs aage bhi barkarar rahe.
Fir bhi yaad rakh bhai tu first year me NOTA se haara tha xD xD
Jokes apart, US relations bana gaya tu to :p
Wishing for a bright future ahead bhai!

I hope Milte hai jald and maje karte!
Till then let your antibodies develop fully xD
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Yo bhai!
A great designer, animator and really a true artist. I really admired you bro!
Baaki insaan to mast ho hi. ekdum chill feel aati baat karke
Kaafi late pata chala ki tum apne Davian bhai bhi ho xD
Nevertheless, it was great meeting you bhai.
I'm sure we'll stay connected. Keep doing wonders bro <3
Mil to nhi paaye, but koi nahi aj na kal, yaha ni to kahi or mil hi lenge ;)

Stay safe and stay wonderful :)
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Well, if I remember correctly our first talk was regarding some ta report. But from thereon we have had numerous memories with each event from Techkriti19 to the last campus interaction at mama mio,adding to the strength of our friendship. 
I have seen u sorting out others' problem more than yours :p and consequently mastering the art of situation handling.
As always I'll be there in need. Let's have a virtual hugðŸ¤— but I hope to have real meetings in future :p Cheers!
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Yo boi!
Bakchodi ke devta, windows ke problems se jujhte, bhut tej bhatta daalne wale taekwondo expert ko mera pranaam.
Apan to first year se wingie h. Ankit ke through tujhe jaana but dhire dhire apan sab family jaise hogye.
Wo bhi kya din the bhai! Tu na hota to kaafi entertainment reh jaata :p, tu na hota to mere windows ka gyaan bhi adhura reh jaata aur, tu na hota to bhai wo rajasthan ke mithai kon khilata xD
Milenge bhai apan sablog, whi hasi whi masti k saath
Tabtak apna dhyan rakh and bakchodi krta reh!
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Hello there!
As far as I remember I came to know u well in esc201 lab. It was fun not knowing anything and being helped by ta's lol. 
On top of fashion trends, campus talks, memes and ya studies u have really been an interesting person to know.
I know a lot of perspectives of various campus peeps about u but the one I have is a good one (A kind,cheerful and a peaceful but lively girl) and ig its right :)
Haha I remember when I called u and talked shit and idk what all. I still feel sorry but grateful to you for understanding my situation back then. 
What shall I say more, u are an amazing girl!
I wish that we meet sometime in future.
Till then, stay safe and be the same nupur!
Adios
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Hello bro!
A brother, friend, guru, footballer, poet and truly a good human. You have been a person whom I'll always look up to. 
College ke 4 saal(actually 2.5) me tu ek bhut important character tha. 1st year me senior ke saath interaction, soc ki padhai n bitching se lekr hall 12 ke room me kuch serious life discussions har jagah tu mahaul banaye rkhta tha.
Jab bhi mai tere room pr jaata kuch naya interesting jaan kr hi aata. Be it some gyaan or koi kaand ka vritaant xD
Wo saari trips kaafi yaadgar thi but tera sense of humour to alag hi h bhai.
Umeed karte hai aage bhi apna bond esa hi rahe. In sab corona discharge (xD) ke baad apan sab jarur milenge bhai.
Till then ghar pr rahe, surakshit rahe :p
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Are bhai, ab tum to alag hi insaan ho, kya hi Kahe.
Itna guts to kisme hota nahi ki apne man ki shanka ko ek mail se mita de xD
Aise to first year me bhi baat hoti thi kabhi kabhar apni. L20 me jaaya krte the, aunty ko namaste, and tumhare vehicle ka bhopu class me bajna sb mast tha. 
Wo bhi kya din the bhai, apan sab bache the, lecture sunne ki koshish krte the xD
Ha project k baad se jrur jaane thoda or but mujhe bhi itna to pta h ki tum mast insaan ho!
Sab moh maaya h, kahi dhoop kahi chahya hai..
I hope tum apna jalwa agrim pariksha me dikhakr desh ke ek nidar member bankr ubhro.
Hoske to milenge jrur! Tab tak ke liye esehi mast raho and khyal rkho
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Hello Nandi!
You have been one of the important person I came to know across my stay. No doubt you seem shy and introvert to unknowns but for the close ones you are just as lively and friendly.
I remember all the cherished moments when we brozz hanged out,all the treats that we went on and what not.
I think the journey through Chemical eng. would have been sort of incomplete with u as a friend.
Hope these dark times get over soon and we meet with happy faces and have a treat yet again :p
Till then adios. Take care!
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Yo bro!
Maan na maan, Paper roll ko asliyat me to maine hi convert kiya tere liye.
First year se wingie. Bhut masti ki, cricket, chiiill, ABC ki taang khichai n what not :p
Bakchod insaan h tu n saath hi saath sisht baalak bhi xD
Milte h bhai kabhi n firse chiill krte xD 
Stay safe, stay same!
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Are tu to apna bhai Hai. The one and only kachua Prasad owner xD and the design master! Right from the first year apan ne Hamesha masti ki. Although Bahar jaate time tu busy hojata tha :p but fir jab Maan Jaye to sb bakchodi me jaate the. 
Khub masti ki throughout 4 yrs (off campus trip included;) Hamesha aise hi Jindal dil raho and bakchodi jaari rakho. The college days will be surely missed but I hope apan log sab touch me the aage bhi!
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Once again 'hello' bhai xD
Bhai apan to 2 top se hi hello krrhe. But overall journey kaafi achi rahi jitna bhi apan interact kiye ho
Tu mast insaan hai bhai, ekdum chill sa baat karta and humour bhi matcheable hai :p
Econometrics to alag hi maja tha bhai, yaad rhega apna teamwork!
Touch me rahenge bhai bilkul
Wish u a bright future! 
Khyal rakho and esehi mast reh. See ya :)
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Hello gupta ji, aasha hai ki aap surakshit hai!
Pure baniya bhai but bilkul chill aadmi ;)
Agree loner hai but lively bhi hai. 
Maje maje me intern laga liya n fir ppo bhi :p aapki to baat hi alag hai!
Treat to ni mil paya tujhse but Umeed karte hai aage milenge!
Till then adios. Surakshit rahe, muskurate rahe and chill maarte rahe :)
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Namaste pandit ji,
Dekhiye parivartan to sansaar ka niyam hai, to bas mai bhi usi ke anukul chalta raha :p
But haa kuch chize shyd nahi badalni chahiye or wo hai apni dosti..
Aise to apan hall3 ke hi the but dekha jaaye to Numerical methods hi tha jaha se hamari dosti shuru hui and I think it was great knowing you bhai. 
Madhur awaaj ke saath humour ka bhi bhandaar hai.. Ek kavi ke important skills.
Baaki insaan to tu mast hai hi, chill rehta and dusro ko bhi chill krdeta.
In all, I must say that you are: shayrion ka pyara, ladkiyon ka laadla or chill vibes ka pitara! xD

Bhai, jab bhi milenge aasmaan ki uchaaiyon pr jarur chalenge (ykwim xD) 
Tabtak bas aisehi mast insaan rahe, surakhsit rahe or safaltayein praapt karte rahe!

Take care bhai. Ciao.
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Yo Shailabh bhaiya,
Bole to ekdum mast insaan. Sab yaad hai bhai mujhe. 
But jo bhi kaho wo first year me SoC se lekr aajtk ka time kaafi jaldi beet gaya. 
Bhut kuch badla, kuch tumhare me, kuch mujhme. Needless to say, ye badlaav ache rahe xD But what is nore important ki apni dosti utni hi achi hai and i hope aage bhi rahe.
Kaafi mehnat aur imaandaari se karte ho tum apne kaam ko and ye bhut achi quality lagti tumhari.
I'm sure ki SG ka safar tumhare bina itna majedaar nahi ho paata. I feel very lucky to know you bhai. Baaki tips wgrah to chalta rhega. Kyuki aakhir gyaan to baatne se badhta hi hai xD
Just stay the same and touch me rehna! Wish u a great future ahead. Ciao.
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Yo bro!
Ab tera kya hi bolna, bilkul mast banda.
1st year se Wingies. 
Start ke phy103 Ke struggle se Nirvana ke ultimate experience tak Saath me bakchodi ki.
Even I have seen you attaining tolerance, and your roomie upgrading from burning paper to real stuff, credit goes to me I know lol xD
Football dekhte reh and be the same boi!
Jarur milege n fullon masti krenge. I wish all this gets over soon.
Till then take care!
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Yo Suhail,
Bhai assignment, lab report share krte krte kaise time nikla pata hi nahi laga.. 
But sabse jyade maje to 3rd year me hi kiye the. Sab yaad h bhai chahe wo pandit ke room me maje ya ncl me che352 ki lab xD
Aisehi mast reh and bekhauf kaand karte reh ;)
All the best for future!
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Yo broo!!
Bhai mujhe yaad hai achi tarike se apni bonding kab hui thi. 
Baat 2nd year ki hai, tu room me pada tha and dukhi tha n sort of helpless.
I feel good ki I was able to provide whatever support I could. Baaki kuch common connections the apne jisse apni dosti or gehri ho payi. 
Tere dosti ke usuloo ki to apan kaafi ijjat karte.. islie tab se, there has no turning back.
Room to tera paas hi tha 3rd year me xD although last me to sbse hi alag hona pada tha mrko.

Still bhai, same for you! Apne aap 'bhai' word nikalta tera naam sunkr.

Jab chize sort out hui thi and tu bata raha tha, tab dil se acha laga tha <3
Pichle kuch dino baat ni hui utni, but koi nahi b'day to maine jrur wish kiya tha ache se, last year ;)

Aage bhi touch me rahenge bhai n hoska to milenge bhi jrur . 
Wish u all the happiness ahead :)
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Yo bro!
From being department fellows to the best of bros, college life was really nice with u.
We have a lot of memories and each of them as good as others. 
Agreed, dance did not relate us better(or maybe the worse :p) but we don't need to have a reason for such a beautiful bond.
Anyways, I honestly loved being scolded by u my mom xD and see I ultimately accepted whatever u said.
There will be a lot of persons throughout both of our lives but I doubt if there will be such a kind and understanding one like u.
I won't write much because there is practically a lot to write. Ya I remember everything to precision lol

Love u bro and miss u badly. I wish you a bright future ahead. Nevertheless I will be always there for u.
Hope we meet someday! Till then adios. Take care :)
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Yogi bhai!
Mast insaan h bhai tu. Ab tujhe to pata hi hai kaise dosti hui thi tujhe xD
Baaki ham to hai hi saadhu log to us naate to bhaichaara hai hi.
Bhai mujhe bhut bura laga jab tu demand krta n mai supply ni krpaa rha tha last me bcz maine chod diya tha ye sab..
But koi ni, supply demand to banta rehta, important ye hai ki tu apna bhai hai!
Pichle kuch time se apni baat nhi ho payi, but wo thoda ghar pr rehne se sbse hi kam hui...

Baaki bhai milenge and khub saari masti krenge! thoda kabir singh mode me kam raha kr tu xD
See u yogi bhai. Yaad rkhiyo mujhe :)
author: Utsav  Akarshan

text:
Hasane me or politics ki bakchodio me expert ye hai apne neta aadmi, the one and only Yogi bhaiya.
Ab Madadgaar to apan the hi, online sem ne stage set up Kiya or khushi h bhai jaane anjaane Teri bhi madad hogyi xD
Baaki refugee bankar h12pl me commentary sunne ke to Alag hi maje the bhai
Milenge kya Pata Delhi me hi kabhi, tbtk esehi mast rah and bakchodi krte reh xD
author: Utsav  Akarshan
